segments.text: Good morning . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning . Would you like to tell me something about the computer ? I've never seen this brand before . What is your superior brand ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is our new brand . I can make sure our computer board is one of the best boards .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you tell me the specialty of your computer board ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: With pleasure . It's easy to have a memory expansion on board capacity and fulfill your needs for a computer . Besides , there is more space for extra cards to expand later on .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What's the memory capacity of the computer ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The hard drive has 260 G and the RAM is 4 G .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you give me a wholesale list ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . The price differs depending on how many you want .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . It depends . If you have a large order , we will give you a discount .
segments.speaker: S1
